de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.storage

Class SettingsStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unistuttgart.vis.wearable.os.storage.SettingsStorage

  • public class SettingsStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used store the sensor properties and the privacy settings.
    Author:
    roehrdor

    • Method Detail

      • readSensors

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Sensor> readSensors()
        Read the sensor settings. This function will return null if they have not yet been saved
        Returns:
        the sensor settings

      • readApps

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,UserApp> readApps()
        Read the Application settings from the file. This function will return null if they have not yet been saved.
        Returns:
        the application settings

      • saveSensorAndPrivacy

        public static void saveSensorAndPrivacy(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Sensor> sensors,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,UserApp> privacy)
        Save the sensor and the privacy settings to file. If any of the parameters is null the old value will be kept and now be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        sensors - the sensors settings
        privacy - the privacy settings
